meanings.sent1: I keep my vitamins in a pillbox to remember to take them every day.
meanings.sent2: The elderly woman carried a pillbox in her purse to store her medication.
meanings.sent3: When the cat knocked over the pillbox, the pills scattered everywhere!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a pillbox of memories, each one carefully stored and labeled.
meanings.sent5: The bright red pillbox on the counter reminded him of the importance of his health.

meanings.definition: A type of hat with a flat crown and straight, upright sides.
meanings.sent1: The soldier wore a pillbox as part of his uniform.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer created a stylish pillbox for the runway show.
meanings.sent3: She felt like a character from a fairy tale wearing the pillbox on her head.
meanings.sent4: The pillbox perched on her head like a tiny fortress guarding her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The pillbox hat added a touch of elegance to her outfit for the party.
